column27: Euratom) No 966/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2012 on the financial rules applicable to the general budget of the Union and repealing Council Regulation (EC
column30: p. 1) introduced in its Article 203 the possibility for institutions to finance the acquisition of property through loans. This item will cover charges incurred by such loans (principal and interest) for the acquisition of property for delegations.
column31: Amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(2) and (3) of the Financial Regulation: p.m.
column34: This appropriation is intended to cover the following expenditure incurred within delegations of the European Union outside the Union and delegations to international organisations situated inside the Union:
column35: temporary accommodation allowances and daily allowances for officials
column38: expenditure incurred in the acquisition of building land and buildings (purchase or lease-purchase option) or construction of offices or other accommodation
column39: including the costs of preliminary studies and various fees.
column44: for all the buildings or parts of buildings occupied by the offices of delegations: rent; water
column46: electricity and heating energy charges; insurance premiums; maintenance and repairs; refurbishment and major repairs; expenditure relating to security
column47: particularly contracts for surveillance and the hiring and refilling of extinguishers; the purchase and maintenance of fire-fighting equipment and the replacement of equipment of voluntary fire-fighting officials; the cost of statutory inspections
